solution_line_template: Out of the {total_students} students, {total_students} x {classroom_fraction} = <<{total_students}*{classroom_fraction}={students_in_classroom}>>{students_in_classroom} students stayed in the classroom.
While {total_students} - {students_in_classroom} = <<{total_students}-{students_in_classroom}={students_in_playground}>>{students_in_playground} students went to the playground.
Out of these {students_in_playground} students, {students_in_playground} x {boys_fraction} = <<{students_in_playground}*{boys_fraction}={boys_in_playground}>>{boys_in_playground} are boys.

Therefore, {students_in_playground} - {boys_in_playground} = <<{students_in_playground}-{boys_in_playground}={girls_in_playground}>>{girls_in_playground} girl students from this class are in the playground.
